concept.title: Prerequisite software
concept.shortdesc: The DITA Open Toolkit can be installed on either Windows or SUSE Linux. It requires a JDK.

conbody.p:
The DITA Toolkit has been tested with the following applications:
Java Development Kit (JDK)
IBM JDK 1.5,
SUN JDK 1.5
Operating systems
Microsoft Windows XP
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server (SLES) 10
Ant 1.7.1 and Saxon 6.5 are included in the full package of the DITA Toolkit.
